events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan and another vehicle at an intersection. They filed the claim promptly to begin processing.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming keywords related to vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specializing in vehicle claims was assigned to handle this auto accident case for further follow-up.
The insurance company formally acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured the customer that the process is underway.
The company requested additional documents including photos of vehicle damage, police report, and contact details of the other driver.
All requested documentation, including detailed photos and the police collision report, was submitted by the customer within the given deadline.
The claim investigation commenced with reviewing submitted evidence and contacting involved parties to verify accident circumstances.
Investigation was completed with confirmation that the accident was caused by the other vehicle running a red light at the intersection.
A fair settlement amount was proposed based on damage estimates and liability assessment from the accident investigation.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely communication and transparency throughout the settlement proposal.
The claim was officially approved after agreement on the settlement figure with the insured party and relevant documentation completed.
Payment was successfully issued to cover repairs of the damaged vehicle as per the agreed settlement amount.
The claim case was formally closed after confirmation that all payments were processed and customer was satisfied with the resolution.
The claim files and all related documentation were archived in compliance with company records retention policies.
